item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, June 4, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Modi set to lose majority in shock Indian election result
2. Trio of Tory donors decide against funding election campaign
3. Tory election hopes hit after Nigel Farage decides to stand for Reform UK
4. Peter Orszag wants to reimagine Lazard. Will his bankers let him?
5. NYSE cancels erroneous trades of Berkshire and other stocks after glitch
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, June 4, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
